description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower Schnitzel With Vegan Mayo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cauliflower Schnitzel With Vegan Mayo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cauliflower, trimmed, cut into 1.5cm thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: To make mayo, place 1/2 cup almond milk, mustard and juice into a small food processor. Process for 30 seconds or until combined. With motor running, slowly add vegetable oil in a steady stream until a thick smooth sauce forms. Season with salt and pepper and set aside.

Combine breadcrumbs, almond meal and parsley in a shallow bowl. Place flour and milk into separate bowls. Lightly coat cauliflower slices in flour, then dip into rest of the milk and coat with breadcrumb mixture. Place onto a large tray.
Heat margarine and olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook schnitzels, in batches, for 3 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Serve schnitzels with mayo and green salad.
